turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm hoping you can help me order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing. what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get a iced coffee lotte grande size with milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want any sweetener or syrups in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Er, no syrups or sweeteners, no.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size was that again?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. let's confirm your order. you want 1 grande iced cafe latte with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. let's place your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Do you need to know Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your drink has been ordered. It will be ready for pick up shortly. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message. Enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. One question, where is it being what store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Where's Starbucks? What's the location I'm supposed to pick it up at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry about that. it will be available at the starbucks on california street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)
